page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
My electric alarm clock wakes me at 7 a.m. After dressing I go downstairs to practise my pieces and scales on the piano. I pack my bag for school and then have my breakfast of muesli with milk, and orange juice. I read until I go to school at 8.40 a.m.
School begins at 9 a.m. I go home for lunch at 12 noon. When school closes at 3.30 p.m. I usually play out in the village with my friends.
We have our tea at about 5.15 p.m. and if it is light my friends and I play out again on our B.M.X. bicycles.
I go to bed at 9 p.m. I clean my teeth and put cream on my face because I have a skin allergy. I wear pyjamas or a nightie in bed. Before I go to sleep I do my bible reading.
